How AI Makes Simulation- based Roleplay and Scenario Training Smarter

AI uses institutional data and training content to build relevant, realistic learning environments. By reflecting actual challenges, processes, and customer interactions, these simulations keep learners engaged and ensure that skills transfer directly to the job.
Creates Contextual Scenarios from Organizational Knowledge

By embedding AI-driven assessments, simulations can evaluate learner performance, confidence, and readiness levels. These insights help managers and L&D teams identify strengths, close skill gaps, and track overall competency growth.

AI collects behavioral and performance data from every session, helping L&D teams refine training content and focus on the most impactful skills. This continuous feedback loop ensures learning programs stay relevant and aligned with evolving team needs.
Captures Data to Improve Future Training

AI continuously analyzes how learners interact with scenarios and adjusts them accordingly—altering difficulty, pacing, or branching options. This keeps learners in the optimal challenge zone, reinforcing areas that need practice and encouraging deeper skill development.

Founded in 2014, Whatfix is advancing the "userization" of application technology with its AI-first platform, empowering companies to maximize the ROI of digital investments across the application lifecycle. Powered by AI, Whatfix’s product suite includes a Digital Adoption Platform (DAP), simulated application environments for hands-on training, and no-code analytics for applications and enterprises.

title: AI agents that Duck Creek can take to market
content: Our Duck Creek instance is not in good condition so we used an alternate application for demo.
AI agent acting as a customer to train agents & adjusters
Agents, adjusters go through troubling scenarios with customers during the calls. Simulation systems are not realistic today & results in poor preparation.
Agents, adjusters are ready to face customers confidently as they have practiced in near real life scenario. Both application & call are simulated.
AI agent performing operations on behalf of the users

title: AI agents that Duck Creek can take to market
content: Our Duck Creek instance is not in good condition so we used an alternate application for demo.
AI agent bringing guidelines at the finger tip

Every insurer spends a lot of effort to define products, underwriting guidelines & claim handling guidelines. The guidelines are refreshed constantly. Users often miss the guidelines resulting in costly underwriting & claim mistakes.
AI to read the guidelines & serve those in the workflow of user.
AI agent performing operations on behalf of the users
Underwriting, policy management & claim processes takes lot of manual effort especially on commercial side.
Agents, underwriters, adjusters achieving higher level of efficiency by AI agent performing on behalf of the users.
AI agent acting as a customer to train agents & adjusters

Agents, adjusters are ready to face customers confidently as they have practiced in near real life scenario. Both application & call are simulated.
